author: wn.com
title: Is Darshan Kang telling the truth about campaigning inside a polling station?
text: Calgarians may want to take note: the Liberal Party candidate for Calgary-Skyview, Darshan Kang , was caught campaigning inside a polling station this past Friday. This is a violation of the Elections Act , and Kang was, accordingly, asked to
